Edges-Elementalist -- Male Human Seasoned Elementalist
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d8
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Focus: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Athletics: (agi) d4 Gambling: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Skill Notes: Ugly: -1 Persuasion
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Elementalist); Elemental Absorption; Elemental Master; New Powers Hindrances: Grim; Suspicious+; Ugly Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Elementalist): Has Armor Interference+, Elemental Origin, and Elemental Synergy features
Suspicious+: Allies suffer -2 on Support rolls
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Robe With Hooded Cloak Shield: None Weapons: Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Sap (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0); Whip (d4+d4)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Elemental Absorption: +2 Toughness near significant source of chosen element
Grim: Provoked (-2 to affect other opponents) by any successful Taunt; lasts until a Joker is drawn
Whip Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Elementalist): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Armor Interference+: In light, medium, or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Elemental Master: May use trappings of 2 chosen elements
Elemental Origin: Powers must use trappings of chosen element
Elemental Synergy: May reroll arcane skill near a significant source of chosen element/-2 arcane skill where chosen element is scarce
